resources.string:
This app displays more-or-less real time prices at 1 minute intervals for various stocks and stock indexes.
Use:

.dji for the DowJones Industrials

.inx for the SP 500

.ixic for the NASDAQ Composite

If there is an incorrect ticker, "ERROR" is placed in the time field. Tickers which return no data, but are valid display "--" in the time field (and usually 0 for the price).

Data is provided by Google.
